attributes.action: Introduce Wealth Tax over Income Tax
attributes.additional_details: Instead of using this system of wealth tax which overall would benefit the government and people’s amount of money it would mean we wouldn’t need to push disabled people into poverty by freezing and reducing benefits while making harder to renew and apply (which is what we’re currently doing)we would have more money to reduce other taxes nobody likes paying we would have more money for roads nhs and more
attributes.background: Slowly Introduce wealth tax over the course of a few years while slowly decreasing income tax don’t completely abolish definitely keep it but introduce a wealth tax over a income tax instead
